contextId.occurrenceNote: A shekel is a unit of weight equal to about 11 grams. Alternate translation: "about 55 kilograms" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/translate-bweight]])
A shekel is a unit of weight equal to about 11 grams. Alternate translation: "about 7 kilograms" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/translate-bweight]])
